articles.author: Sandee Lamotte, CNN, Naomi Thomas, CNN
articles.title: Some people still need to mask up even if vaccinated. Are you one of them? - KSL.com
articles.description: The news flashed across the country — mask-free at last! Does that mean those Americans vaccinated at least two weeks ago — meaning full immunity has kicked in — can throw their masks in the air and hug all in celebration? Not quite.
articles.content:
ATLANTA (CNN) The news flashed across the country mask-free at last!
People who are fully vaccinated against COVID-19 no longer have to wear masks inside or outside, nor do they have to stay 6 feet … [+7201 chars]

articles.title: Former Arizona State men's basketball guard Remy Martin elects to transfer to Kansas - ESPN
articles.description: Remy Martin, a 6-foot point guard who could be a preseason All-America selection next season after deciding to leave Arizona State, will transfer to Kansas, he told ESPN on Monday.
articles.content:
Former Arizona State guard Remy Martin, the No. 1-ranked transfer in the country, committed to Kansas on Monday night.
Martin confirmed the decision to ESPN via text message.

articles.title: Deontay Wilder's team stay silent amid reports the American's arbitration ruling could prevent Joshua vs Fury fight - Sky Sports
articles.description: Deontay Wilder's team have remained silent amid reports that Tyson Fury has been ordered by a court to face the American before a fight against Anthony Joshua.
